entities.description: The status or relation of the offender to the victim.
The relation of the victim to the offender, such as spouse, parent, sibling, etc.
The frequency of each type of offender relationship within the given dataset.
Indicates the portion of data that is missing.

relationships.description: Associates an incident with the status of the involved offender.
Associates an incident with the status of the involved victim.
Describes the frequency of each type of offender relationship within the dataset.
Indicates the amount of data that is missing within the dataset.
